'''Carreigh Macumail''' was one of the few [[human]]s in [[Evermeet]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.History:
Born in the [[Moonshae Isles]], Carreigh was for a long time a pirate in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], first under Captain [[Delvar Corzon]] and afterward with his own ship, the ''[[Mist-Walker]]''.

After relocating to Evermeet, he patrolled the [[Sword Coast]] under the orders of Queen [[Amlaruil Moonflower]].
document_data.Personality: Carreigh was a good man with a good sense of humor. Most people underestimated his intelligence but Carreigh learned not to care. He was a skilled sailor and warrior.
document_data.Relationships: Carreigh was a close friend of the [[elf]] druid [[Aerilaya]] and thanks to her he also became friends with the queen.
